description:
Bent on a “mega-deal” security pact with Saudi Arabia, Congress and the Biden administration see their chance.

The post After Israel Kills Hamas Leader, D.C. Pushes to Hand Palestine to Saudi Arabia appeared first on The Intercept.
title: After Israel Kills Hamas Leader, D.C. Pushes to Hand Palestine to Saudi Arabia

description:
Following the state Supreme Court’s last-minute intervention, Roberson is expected to testify next week at a legislative hearing on Texas’s junk science law.

The post Texas Lawmakers’ Unprecedented Actions Halt Robert Roberson’s Execution — For Now appeared first on The Intercept.
title: Texas Lawmakers’ Unprecedented Actions Halt Robert Roberson’s Execution — For Now

description:
RTX’s bombs regularly kill children and civilians. It does white-collar crimes too, according to a $950 million fraud and bribery settlement this week.

The post When Blood Money Isn’t Enough: Raytheon Admits to Defrauding Pentagon appeared first on The Intercept.
title: When Blood Money Isn’t Enough: Raytheon Admits to Defrauding Pentagon
